versions.title: Type of Concept Group
versions.definition: Specifies the rationale for creating a concept group.
versions.notes: This vocabulary was first published by the DDI Alliance. Please see: https://ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies/all.
versions.citation: DDI Alliance. (2020). Type of Concept Group (Version 1.0) [Controlled vocabulary]. CESSDA. urn:ddi:int.ddi.cv:TypeOfConceptGroup:1.0.
versions.ddiUsage:
DDI 3.3

Module name: conceptualcomponent

Element name: TypeOfConceptGroup


DDI 3.2 Module name: conceptualcomponent

Element name: TypeOfConceptGroup


DDI 2.5

DDI-Codebook (DDI 2.5 and all previous DDI versions) does not include an element that would support this controlled vocabulary.

concepts.title: Administrative
concepts.definition: A concept group created for administrative purposes, for instance for subsetting or reorganizing data.

concepts.title: Thematic
concepts.definition: A concept group created to bring together concepts reflecting the same general theme, or topic; for example, a group called "Trust" can include trust in institutions, trust in government, as well as interpersonal trust.

concepts.title: Other
concepts.definition: Use when the type of concept group is known, but not found in the list.

versions.title: Type konseptgruppe
versions.definition: Spesifiserer rasjonale for å lage en konseptgruppe.
versions.citation: DDI Alliance. (2020). TypeOfConceptGroup[Type konseptgruppe] (Version 1.0.1) [Controlled vocabulary]. CESSDA. urn:ddi:int.ddi.cv:TypeOfConceptGroup:1.0.1.
versions.ddiUsage:
DDI 3.3

Module name: conceptualcomponent

Element name: TypeOfConceptGroup


DDI 3.2 Module name: conceptualcomponent

Element name: TypeOfConceptGroup


DDI 2.5

DDI-Codebook (DDI 2.5 and all previous DDI versions) does not include an element that would support this controlled vocabulary.
versions.translateAgency: NSD - Norwegian Centre for Research Data

concepts.title: Administrativ
concepts.definition: En konseptgruppe som lages for administrative formål, for eksempel for å subsette eller reorganisere data.

concepts.title: Tematisk
concepts.definition: En konseptgruppe som lages for å knytte sammen konsepter som gjenspeiler det samme generelle tema eller emne; for eksempel, en gruppe kalt "Tillit" kan inkludere tillit til institusjoner, tillit til styresmakter, så vel som mellommenneskelige tillit.

concepts.title: Annen
concepts.definition: Bruk når typen konseptgruppe er kjent, men ikke finnes på listen.
